and.name: Multi-artefact Management
and.description: High-level (Root) feature for approaches with multiple artefacts (Models or schemas)

feature.name: Multi-artifact
feature.description: Addresses the paradigm of handling multiple, diverse model types with distinct constraints. This feature is concerned with the interaction, where each model may have different structures, rules, or semantics.

feature.name: Approaches
feature.description: Covers a wide range of ML/AI-based techniques used to address the challenges of model and schema comparison.
